Install the WooCommerce plugin on your site and then %2$s To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to this account. \n\nOnce setup, %2$s To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to a WordPress.com account refresh the app refresh the app to continue Checking for WooCommerce… Attempting to login with Jetpack… View connected stores To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin connected on your store. Learn how to install and connect Jetpack View setup instructions What is Jetpack? Jetpack is a free WordPress plugin that connects your store with the tools needed to give you the best mobile experience, including push notifications and stats Already have Jetpack? %1$s Jetpack not found. Please try again Sign in Need help finding the connected email? What email do I use to sign in? In your site admin you can find the email you used to connect to WordPress.com from the %1$sJetpack Dashboard%2$s under %3$sConnections > Account connection%4$s Connection error Here are a few other things you can try: Sign in with WordPress.com Read our troubleshooting tips Select an option It looks like %1$s isn\'t associated with a WordPress.com account. Days Weeks Months Years Visitors Orders Revenue No revenue this period Error fetching data Error image Today\'s Stats Updated moments ago Updated %d minutes ago Updated 1 hour ago Updated %d hours ago Updated 1 day ago Updated on %s Top performers Gain insights into how products are performing on your store Total spend Total orders: %s No activity this period View Order View Orders You have 1 order to fulfill You have %1$d orders to fulfill Review, prepare, and ship these pending orders Upgrade to keep seeing your stats We\'ve rolled out improvements to our analytics. Upgrade to WooCommerce 4.0 or above or install WooCommerce Admin plugin to keep seeing your stats after September 1, 2020. We can\'t display your\n store\'s analytics Make sure you are running the latest version of WooCommerce on your site and that you have WooCommerce Admin activated.\n\nStill need help? %1$s Contact us No Orders #%s %1$s %2$s Error fetching orders Filter orders by Filter Search orders : %1$s Looking up your orders… Customer information %1$s %2$s \u0022%1$s\u0022 Guest Order #%s %1$s \u2022 #%2$s %1$s %2$s Shipping method Shipping details Billing details email customer Call or message customer Call Message %1$s x %2$s %1$s%2$s x %3$s Tax: SKU: SKU: %1$s Product Image Product Products QTY %1$s via %2$s Awaiting payment via %s Paid by customer Refunded Refunded products %1$s via %2$s Net (%1$s) -%1$s Customer provided note Customer profile image Compose an order note Private To customer System Order notes Fulfill Order #%s Payment Cleared Show Billing Hide Billing Add a note Add an order note Click to change order status Track shipment Copy tracking number Delete tracking No address specified. This order is using extensions to calculate shipping. The shipping methods shown might be incomplete. Issue refund Package %d Refund shipping label Ship from Ship to Package details Shipping carriers and rates Payment method Credit card Show shipment details Hide shipment details %1$s\n%2$s Track shipment %1$s label refunded %1$s \u2022 %2$s Request a refund Remaining products Reprint shipping label Print shipping labels from your device! We are working on making it easier for you to print shipping labels directly from you device! For now, if you have created shipping labels for this order in your store admin with WooCommerce Shipping, you can print them in your Order Details here. Mark order complete Mark Order Complete Order Marked Complete Order status changed to %s Error fetching error notes Error changing order Error fetching order Tracking Tracking Number Tracking number copied to the clipboard Track package Track or delete shipment tracking Shipment tracking Copy tracking number to clipboard Shipped %s Optional tracking information Add tracking Deleted shipment tracking Error deleting tracking Tracking deleted You can request a refund for a shipping label that has not been used to ship a package. It will take at least 14 days to process. Purchase date Amount eligible for refund Refund label (-%1$s) Refund was successfully submitted Your refund is being processed. Please wait… If there was a printing error when you purchased the label, you can print it again. If you already used the label on a package, printing and using it again is a violation of our terms of service. Paper size Choose paper size Print shipping label See label layout and paper size options Don\'t know how to print with your phone? Error previewing shipping label Legal (8.5 x 14 in) Letter (8.5 x 11 in) Label (4 x 6 in) Print with your device Label format options 1 2 3 4 5 Make sure your printer and your device are connected to the same WiFi networks After selecting \"Print shipping label\", you may have to select and add a printer if you haven\'t printed from this device before. You can select your device\'s default print service or install your printer\'s brand app (this should appear as a recommended option) You might have to configure WiFi printing directly on the printer itself. Make sure the printer firmware is updated and see your printer documentation for instructions. If you are still experiencing issues printing from your device, you can save your label as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device. %s available for refund Refund %s Are you sure you want to issue a refund? This can’t be undone. Complete the refund by transferring the money to the customer manually. Error fetching product reviews Error fetching new product review View the product Approve Approved Unapproved Spam Trash Error loading product review detail Error updating product review status Review %1$s left a review on %2$s %1$s left a review Review marked as %1$s Mark all as read All reviews marked as read Error marking all reviews as read Product image Add image Error fetching product Product not found Error fetching product variations Title Purchase note Pricing and inventory %1$s: %2$s %1$s (%2$s options) Edit product Inventory Add inventory Variants Price Add price Add shipping Regular price Sale price Schedule sale Automatically start and end a sale From To Remove end date Sale dates %1$s - %2$s From %1$s Until %1$s Tax settings Tax status Tax class Standard rate None Taxable Shipping SKU Helps to easily identify this product Stock status Product type %s product downloadable Any Manage stock Limit one per order Stock quantity Backorders Shipping Weight Size Length Width Height Dimensions Shipping class No shipping class Shipping settings Total orders \u2022 rated %d times \u2022 rated once \u2022 no ratings Reviews Downloads Downloadable files Limit %d downloads Expiry %d days Purchase details Share your product View product on store View affiliate product In stock In stock \u2022 %d variations Out of stock On backorder %s in stock Do not allow Allow Allow, but notify customer No products yet No products found No matching products Filters Sort by Date: Newest to oldest Newest Date: Oldest to newest Oldest Title: A to Z A to Z Title: Z to A Z to A Filters (%d) Filters \u2022 %d Show products Selected filter option Search products Selected sorting option Limited editing available We\'ve added editing functionality to simple products. Keep an eye out for more options soon! Create products from the app! It\'s now possible to create new simple, linked and grouped products on the go from the Woo app. Not ready yet? Save them as a draft! New editing options available We\'ve added more editing functionalities to products! You can now update images, see previews and share your products. You can now edit grouped, external and variable products, change product type and update categories and tags.  \u2022  Adding options like size and color is currently available only on the web. These will show up as options on the product page of your site. Start writing… Edit description Description Describe your product Short description Brief summary about the product Updating product Please wait… Error updating product Product updated Error updating password Enter Product Title Enter text %1$s product Add more details This product has no variations yet Quantity How many items are in stock SKU already in use by another product Please enter a number Sale price must be less than regular price You must set the sale price if a sale is scheduled Product settings Trash product Do you want to move this product to the Trash? Move to trash Product moved to trash Error trashing product Status Visibility Public Private Enter password Password protected Password is required Catalog visibility Shop and search results Shop only Search results only Hidden Featured product This setting determines which shop pages products will be listed on Slug This is the URL-friendly version of the product title Enable reviews Virtual product Add product link Product link Enter the external URL to the product Button text This text will be shown on the button linking to the external product An optional note to send the customer after purchase Menu order Determines the product\'s positioning in the catalog. The lower the value of the number, the higher the item will be on the product list. You can also use negative numbers. Enabled Disabled No price set Categories Add category Add your first category Organise your products in categories Add category Product category added Error creating category - Name already exists on your site. Error creating category Enter a category name Category name Parent category Adding category Please wait… Add tag Tags Add your first tag Organise your products in tags Adding tag Error occurred when adding tags Change product type Grouped products Delete the grouped product Add product Add products to the group %d products selected %d product selected Save as draft Linked products Upsells Products promoted instead of the currently viewed product (ie: more profitable products) Cross-sells Products promoted in the cart when current product is selected Add products Edit products %d product %d products %d cross-sell product %d cross-sell products %d upsell product %d upsell products Add more details Add weight and dimensions Organise your products into related groups Make your products easier to find with tags A brief excerpt about your product Increase sales with upsells and cross-sells Error fetching variation Error updating variation Variation updated Variations without price won\'t be shown in your store Some variations do not have prices Add a variation image Photos Add photos Add photo Replace photo Remove photo Add a product image Error removing product image Error uploading product image Please wait for the current operation to complete Failed to capture image Are you sure you want to remove this image? Collect information Improved stats Creating products Test out the new simple, linked and grouped product creation as we get ready to launch Product editing Test out the new product editing functionality as we get ready to launch Share information with our analytics tool about your use of services while logged in to your WordPress account This information helps us improve our products, make marketing to you more relevant, personalize your WooCommerce experience, and more as detailed in our privacy policy Read privacy policy Privacy Notice for California Users We use other tracking tools, including some from third parties. Read about these and how to control them. Made with love by Automattic. %1$s We\'re hiring! Blog from the bus. Comment from the café. WordPress goes where you go. Watch readers from around the world read and interact with your site — in realtime. Catch up with your favorite sites and join the conversation anywhere, any time. Your notifications travel with you — see comments and likes as they happen. Manage your Jetpack-powered site on the go — you\'ve got WordPress in your pocket. Next Open mail Alternatively: Log in by entering your site address. Log in with your username. Almost there! Nice to see you again! If you’re digging the app, we\’d love a rating on the Google Play Store. Rate now Later No thanks Tap to switch stores Got it Try it now Running multiple stores? You can now switch between stores by tapping the selected store in Settings Published Privately published Private Pending review Draft Trashed Simple Grouped External Variable Physical Virtual Select a product type An item you ship to the customer A product with variations like color or size A service or digital download A collection of related products Link a product to an external website Are you sure you want to change the product type?
